title: Michigan Archaeologist
additional-notes: A 1986 renewal for the 1958 book 'The Sanilac Petroglyphs' mentions that material in the book had previously been published in the December 1957 issue of Michigan Archaeologist.  This renewal is likely too late to cover that earlier publication.
Spot-checks of early issues did not turn up copyright notices.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Shelton Henderson for copyright research on this title.
